Question: It’s ……. o’clock (with times having one as their reference)
Quarter to; number minus a quarter
Half past; number plus one half
Quarter past; number plus a quarter
Half past two; two and a half
Half past one; one and a half
۔۔۔۔۔۔۔ بجا ہے
Answer: It’s ……. o’clock (with times having one as their reference)

Question: پونے
Answer: Quarter to; number minus a quarter

Question: ساڑھے
Answer: Half past; number plus one half

Question: سوا
Answer: Quarter past; number plus a quarter

Question: ڈھائی
Answer: Half past two; two and a half

Question: ڈیڑھ
Answer: Half past one; one and a half
